title: Prestige Royale Gardens
description:
Located in the pristine environs of Yelahanka, Bangalore, Prestige Royale Gardens promises a life that is refreshingly bereft of the city’s noise and bustle while being within arm’s length of its many conveniences.

With a fine elevation and all modern-day amenities at your disposal, the Royale Gardens offers a choice between 1, 2, 2.5 & 3 bedroom residential apartments that finely blend impeccable planning and flawless taste together.
